mean_cn: n.游行；检阅；  v.游行，（使）列队行进；炫耀
mean_en: a public celebration of a special day or event, usually with bands in the streets and decorated vehicles; a formal occasion when soldiers march or stand in lines so that they can be examined by their officers or other important people
sentence: The New Year parade in Chinatown is always a popular event.
sentence_trans: 在唐人街举办的新年大游行总是受人欢迎。
word_etyma: par看见 + ade集体 → 集体出现 → parade游行
